value:
--changed source field for reinsurer_name 8/7/2020
select 
--cast(dim_reinsurer_key as integer) as dim_reinsurer_key,
max_sid,
reinsurer_id,
reinsurer_cod_ccia,
reinsurer_name,
reinsurer_rut,
src_sys_code,
actv_rec_ind,
etl_audit_id
from
(select
--NVL(LKP_MAX_KEY.max_sid,0)+num as dim_reinsurer_key,
LKP_MAX_KEY.max_sid,
CAST (SRC.reinsurer_id as INTEGER) reinsurer_id,
SRC.reinsurer_cod_ccia,
SRC.reinsurer_name,
SRC.reinsurer_rut,
SRC.src_sys_code,
SRC.actv_rec_ind,
SRC.etl_audit_id
from
(select
'axis' as src_sys_code,
(GEN_CIAS.sperson) as reinsurer_id,
row_number() over (order by reinsurer_id) AS num,
(GEN_CIAS.ccia) as reinsurer_cod_ccia,
--(PERSONAS.tnombre || ' ' || PERSONAS.tapelli) as reinsurer_name,
--(isnull(PERSONAS.tnombre,'') || ' ' || isnull(PERSONAS.tapelli,'')) as reinsurer_name,
--ltrim(rtrim(translate(PERSONAS.tbuscar,'#',''))) as reinsurer_name,
TRIM(translate(PERSONAS.tbuscar,'#','')) as reinsurer_name,
(PERSONAS.nnumnif) as reinsurer_rut,
'Y' actv_rec_ind,
'0' etl_audit_id,
1 as dummy
from 
cdp_ods.sisaxis_gen_cias GEN_CIAS
LEFT JOIN cdp_ods.sisaxis_personas PERSONAS
ON GEN_CIAS.sperson = PERSONAS.sperson
)SRC
left outer join
(
select 1 as dummy,max(dim_reinsurer_key) as  max_sid  from  cdp_dwh.dim_reinsurer_t) LKP_MAX_KEY
on SRC.dummy=LKP_MAX_KEY.dummy 
)

SELECT 
DIM.dim_reinsurer_key,
DIM.src_sys_code,
DIM.reinsurer_id
FROM 
cdp_dwh.dim_reinsurer_t  DIM
